article:
Jim Green is an announcer  for the program  . Most of the girls _ boys like the program. They _ like Jim Green. Some of them often make phone calls to him and thank him
 _ his work, there are lots of _ to him every day, too.
Jim Green gets up at 6:00 every morning. He has bread and a glass of milk _ breakfast. He leaves home at 6:30 and gets to  his office at 7:15. The program _ at 7:30.He plays the new records   of the pop songs and modern music for his listeners. At 8:00 it's time  _ the news. Jim finishes work at 10:30. He goes home _ his car. He _ newspaper and listens to music after supper. He thinks his life is very interesting.
